    • Method Detail

      • getGG

        public static GestionnaireGoal getGG()

      • addGoal

        public void addGoal(java.lang.String goal_title,
                    java.lang.String goal_description,
                    java.lang.String nick)
             throws ObjectCreatedException,
                    ObjectAlreadyExistsException
        This method is used when a user wants to add a goal to his Goal List (via the AddGoalView). It checks if the goal is already registered in the database.

        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user), goal_title, goal_description If the goal is already in the database, then this method returns an ObjectAlreadyExistsException, else an ObjectCreatedException is returned, the goal is added to the database and to the Goal List, and the Goal List is refreshed.
        Throws:
        ObjectCreatedException, - ObjectAlreadyExistsException
        ObjectCreatedException
        ObjectAlreadyExistsException

      • getStringGoalList

        public java.lang.String[][] getStringGoalList(java.lang.String nickname)
        This method is used when a user log in his main page. It gets the needed informations for the SimpleUserView and modifies their types to String

        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user)
        Returns:
        String 2D Table It checks if the Goal List is empty before filling the StringGoalList.

      • deleteGoal

        public void deleteGoal(java.lang.String goal_name,
                       java.lang.String nicknameUser)
                throws ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException,
                       ObjectDeletedException
        This method is used when a user deletes one of his goals. It deletes the selected goal from the database (thanks to its goal_name). The goal_name argument specifies the user and must be a String.

        Parameters:
        goal_name, - nickname (a String giving the nickname of the user) If the goal does not exists, this method returns an ObjectAlreadyExistsException, else an ObjectDeletedException is returned, the goal is deleted from the database and the Goal List, and the Goal List is refreshed.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException, - ObjectDeletedException
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
        ObjectDeletedException

      • deleteAllCurrentInfos

        public void deleteAllCurrentInfos()
        This method is used when a user disconnects. It deletes all the current informations from goal_selected, goalList, stringGoalList
